# Introduction

# Getting Started
```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
packages = c('sp', 'rgdal', 'sf', 'tidyverse', 'tmap', 'ggplot2', 'maptools', 'raster', 'spatstat')
for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```

# Import data
```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
hk_district <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "HKDistrict18")
location <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "hong_kong_location")
```

#EPSG:2326
```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
hk_district_2326 <- st_set_crs(hk_district, 2326)
location_2326 <- st_set_crs(location, 2326)
tm_shape(hk_district_2326) + tm_polygons() + tm_shape(location_2326) + tm_bubbles(size = 0.05)
```
